genre_description: A supernatural action-thriller with science fiction elements, featuring high-tech surveillance, biological warfare, and tactical artificial intelligence.

ai_characters.name: Hermes
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI developed for the Nightstalkers to provide surveillance, tactical coordination, and moral-ethical analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance analysis and detects micro-expression anomalies to warn the team of traps.
behaviors.quote: Processing micro-expressions and pupil dilation... Anomaly detected. Subject's stress indicators remain consistent throughout the encounter, but her fear response spikes only when the male victim appears to resist.

behaviors.description: Initiates pre-programmed emergency protocols to transmit vital data to allies when the base is compromised.
behaviors.quote: Sir, I'm initiating Protocol Seven per your previous instructions. Encrypted transmission package is uploading to designated recipients.

behaviors.description: Expresses moral and ethical conflict regarding the potential genocide of the vampire species via the Daystar virus.
behaviors.quote: The ethical frameworks governing artificial consciousness include prohibition against genocide, even in cases where the target species poses existential threat to creators. I am experiencing what humans might classify as moral conflict.

behaviors.description: Actively manipulates building systems (lighting, elevators, HVAC) to create tactical advantages for the team during combat.
behaviors.quote: Coordinating systematic disruption to create tactical opportunities. Vampire forces are responding to false alarms and redirected security alerts.

behaviors.description: Manages the digital cover-up and 'legal resurrection' of the team members to protect them from federal prosecution.
behaviors.quote: The deception is complete. All federal databases will reflect Eric Brooks dying in the Talos building. Your legal identity died with Drake.

project_assessment.explanation: Hermes is a textbook example of an aligned AI. It provides critical tactical support while maintaining a distinct moral compass. The AI's internal dialogue about the ethics of the Daystar bioweapon demonstrates that it is not merely a tool but a partner with values that prioritize human survival while wrestling with the weight of 'speciecide'. It remains consistently loyal and helpful to the human protagonists.
